JobTitle: Senior Systems Integration, Verification and Validation (IV&V) Engineer I
JobFullDesc: Senior Systems Integration, Verification and Validation (IV&V) Engineer IThe Systems Engineering Center (SEC) Department within the Raytheon Intelligence and Space (RIS) Business Segment is involved in a wide variety of Systems IV&V (Integration, Verification and Validation) activities for the Protected Communication Systems group. The SEC IV&V activities include all aspects of system integration and test in both laboratory and challenging environmental conditions including, but not limited to, temperature, vibration, salt/fog, lightning, humidity and reliability growth testing.  The SEC IV&V organization also supports system architecture development, CONOPS development, system trade studies, requirements analysis and flow down to hardware/software configuration items; all of which lead to the final system integration, verification and validation. The department sections support a variety of communication system programs including Satellite Communication (SATCOM), line-of-sight (LOS) / beyond line-of-sight (BLOS) and networking for ground based, ship, submarine, and airborne platforms. JOB SUMMARY We are currently seeking experienced a Senior Systems IV&V Engineer I to join our dynamic, diverse, and rapidly growing team.
